data.title: so seems like this particular piece has 30% less capacity than the ...
data.review: Bought this product from Cloudtail India during one of the Amazon sales.What comes in the box:10400mAh Powerbank, Charging cable, instruction manual.Charging:I have an phone with a battery capacity of approx 3000 mAh and the power bank gives me about 2-2.5 charges... so seems like this particular piece has 30% less capacity than the 10400 mAh.Size & Weight:I have to say that this product is larger than i thought it would be when i bought it. It is about 5.5 inches long - which is about the size of a pen, 2 inches tall and 1 inch high.This being said, it is pretty light and can easily be carried around in your bag but probably would not fit in your pocket.Overall, i think that for many people a battery pack with a single charge might be easier to carry around and do the trick of getting your phone through the entire day... but if you are constantly on the move or need the exrta capacity, this would be a great bet.

data.title: Good Performance
data.review: It has been two months that I brought this power bank & I have to say that this powerbank is working very much good. Its very decent looking power bank. I have the black colour variant of it and its very easy to use it. The device comes with 2 USB ports for charging having an output current of 2.1 A and an output voltage of 5 V. Its very hand and easy to use. One intresting feature of the powerbank which i like is that when you plug your device its automatically starts charging the device without you needed to switch it on. It has a decent looking battery indicator . And all of the above this device comes from a well reputed company so its really value for you money. So thumbs up to this power bank and I would suggest you to buy this since its very good in performance but also at the same time its affordable too..

data.title: Not a good one
data.review: I thought Lenovo is a good brand, but thinking is not always right.Reviewing it after use of 1 year.Battery is the most Important thing as it is shown it's of 10400 mah power, but its actually capacity is 5k-5.5k,Looks like a duplicate one,Maybe amazon has cheated,After using ut for a 1 year its capacity had decreased to abt. 4k mah..So buy intex or syska at the place of this lenovo... Otherwise its everyone's own thinking.. all the best ha, coz if u gonna buy it then u would need a good ATB.

data.title: Duplicate Product in the brand of Lenovo.
data.review: In the name of Lenovo brand this is a duplicate product. This is fooling of customer form Amazon.Just after couple of weeks, this product is useless. It takes hour n hours to get charged and after full charge also it hardly charge the mobile one time.This is just ridiculous and I am very much annoyed by it. I was out of station and now I can not return this product also having amazon's ten days policy. Amazon should refund\accept return of this product.

data.title: Build quality is really good at this price point and considering the grand name
data.review: Build quality is really good at this price point and considering the grand name. The length of the USB provided is nearly useless. Powerbank takes almost 6 hours to charge up completely. I am quite disappointed when I found out that my mobile (2600mAH) could be charged just thrice and the capacity promised by the power bank is of 10400.

data.title: One thing more i'd like to share with u people dont charge powerbanks with ...
data.review: Gud backup approx 9000mah plus,Very light weight product,Only thing is no led flashlight inbuilt, but its a powerbank nt a light utility.So 5star for backup purpose.One thing more i'd like to share with u people dont charge powerbanks with 2amp or 4 amp chargers, use slow chargers theyll give more backups in returnüëçüëçüëç

data.title: I hate this - useless : stopped working in 2 months.
data.review: HiI purchased the Lenovo Power bank on 1st June 2015 : pretty expensive viz a viz other power banks. I started to make use of the same around October 2015 and it has stopped working.This is soooo depressing and dejection for Lenovo.I hate this product and suggest noone should ever buy this.Replacement also not possible.

data.title: Good one must buy
data.review: This one can charge my Lumia 720 3.5 times from fully drained battery power. But to charge this powerbank it takes more than 6 hrs which is not a big deal. You could use a higher amp charger to charge it faster. It could have come up with a charging cord. Yes it gets dirty fast. I even bought another one for my mom.

data.title: Power bank charging does not get completed.
data.review: Even after keeping the power bank for charging for 24 hours, the charging does not end, and the fourth step light keeps blinking. So its not getting charged fully. I guess the inside batteries may be from old stock with expired life. May be the reason for heavy discount.Initiated return of the product.

data.title: Lenovo Power Bank - Not getting charged ! Bad Experience !
data.review: After unpacking Lenove Power Bank , I put the unit on charging . Even after 24 hours it doesn't get itself charged . Product failure or faulty unit that is Lenovo and supplier to decide. But for me it's  bad experience with Lenovo product . Hope they wil replace the faulty unit under warranty .

data.title: Lost it, that's why I don't like it
data.review: Lol. As far as getting the job done is concerned, this is a nice product and charges my phone at least twice before dying out. However, the casing is prone to visible scratches making it look ugly and dirty easily, if possible, get a different colour

data.title: Waste of Money
data.review: Don't go for this product... my galaxy note 3 having 3100 mah battery which is charged once & powerbank battery drain out in one charge eventhough it's fully charged... problem started exactly finishing 10 days return policy as per sellers terms.

data.title: Short life
data.review: Writing review after 11 months of uses.Now after 11 months the backup of this power bank has drastically reduced. Right now it's almost having 50% of the strength as compared to the day one. It seems it may not work more than 2 months from now.

data.title: Horrible Quality- Never Buy
data.review: This product couldn't even survive for a week and one of the USB port came out from board. I requested Amazon for the replacement before but they didnt initiate anything. Will never recommend anyone else to buy this ugly product.

data.title: Good for travelling
data.review: It is very cool in charging in 50 to 60 minutes it is hardly take to charge a big to big battery and it usually takes also 1 hour to charge this power bank but I'm giving it four star because of its size it is usually big

data.title: Drains out faster than expected
data.review: After a full charge (about 2 hrs), if i charge a mobile phone, the power bank  goes down to two bars within 30 mins. Also its a lot bulky than expected and not an easy one to carry in ones pocket or even a ladies pursue.

data.title: After using lenovo powerbank 10400mah for 1 month
data.review: After using this powerbank for 1 month.Lenovo powerbank is not giving full 10400mah performance. My mobile battery is 1800mah. Powerbank gets discharged fully after 3 times charging. Plus point is it is cheap that's it.

data.title: Feeling cheated by amazon by lenovo.
data.review: Specification shows 10400 mh power bank whereas truth is that it can't charge my Samsung j8 once... Means power bank capacity is not capable enough to charge j8 once.. So don buy this power bank they are cheating us.

data.title: Worth for money
data.review: I got it from amazon @ 519 RS. My family members are  using the same product from long time so I ordered it for myself.... After the use, I am reviewing it.... It is good for ur mobile charging n can trust lenovo.
